entry.title: STORM SURGE WARNING , Pointe-à-la-Croix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:44 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.0°C

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h near noon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
